::Shadow Wing::

She got a hit in the wing. "AHH!" The missle hot on her tail. She 
could barely out fly it with her wing damaged.  she swerved in and 
out of the trees. Her owl instincts taking over. She dove and rose.  
The missle was closing in. "Got to out think it." she told herself.
She held still in front of a tree for a few seconds.  She watched the 
missle close in.  She swooped down and let an air draft help lift her 
up and the missle hits the tree she was just in front of.  she glided 
down and landed.  She transformed into bot mode and ran over to 
Prowl. She opened fire on Zeus. "Glad to see you joined the party 
Lunarpine." She smiled and shot at Zeus again.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zeus/Killer/Prowl/Striker::
> 
> Zeus dives under Torca's shot, one missile firing at Torca and 
another at 
> Shadow Wing. He yells, sweeping at Shadow Wing, beak and talons 
slashing.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Killer doubles over as a shot from Striker digs into his stomach. 
He yells in 
> rage, straightens out, and jumps at Striker, taking out his sword 
and 
> slashing at him.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Prowl ducks under a shot, noting that Lunarpine had arrived.
> 
> "Glad to see you're here," he says over his comm-link, jumping into 
the air 
> and flying at Sixshot.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Striker stumbles back, Killer's slash leaving a gash in his chest. 
He growls, 
> swinging his own sword.
